data.route_analysis: Accessibility by plane and bus, local transportation available in cities.
data.seasonal_patterns: December and January see the most visitors, while February to March also offers great weather.
data.climate: Temperatures range from 20-25°C (68-77°F), mild and pleasant, suitable for outdoor activities.
data.culture: Rich indigenous history, colorful markets, and traditional festivals, including Day of the Dead celebrations.
data.attractions: Tikal National Park, Antigua Guatemala, Lake Atitlán, Semuc Champey.
